Name: Mauricio Antonio
description:
Mauricio is a farmer who grows fruits and vegetables. This occupation has allowed him to become a fundamental pillar for improving his family's quality of life.

He has come to the nearest office of MiCredito with the goal of requesting a Kiva loan to buy bags to protect the guavas and so avoid the pests that damage the fruits.

In the future, Mauricio wants to cultivate two hectares of cabbage.
